game.name: Chef Survivor
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Chef Survivor is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled chef facing a nightmare scenario.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chef Survivor is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled chef facing a nightmare scenario.

reviewHighlights.text: This game is very suspicious. Look like a scam try. The game had 1 Euro price what suddenly increased to 40 Euro. It have almost only Positive reviews...
